16-bit Register Instructions

INC nn
03	BC	00 00 0011
13	DE	00 01 0011
23	HL	00 10 0011
33	SP	00 11 0011

DEC nn
0B	BC	00 00 1011
1B	DE	00 01 1011
2B	HL	00 10 1011
3B	SP	00 11 1011

ADD16 HL, nn
09	BC	00 00 1001
19	DE	00 01 1001
29	HL	00 10 1001
39	SP	00 11 1001

Incrementor Instructions

INC n
3C	A	00 111 100
04	B	00 000 100
0C	C	00 001 100
14	D	00 010 100
1C	E	00 011 100
24	H	00 100 100
2C	L	00 101 100
34 (HL)	00 110 100

DEC n
3D	A	00 111 101
05	B	00 000 101
0D	C	00 001 101
15	D	00 010 101
1D	E	00 011 101
25	H	00 100 101
2D	L	00 101 101
35 (HL)	00 110 101

8-Bit ALU Instructions

ADD A,n
87	A	10000 111
80	B	10000 000
81	C	10000 001
82	D	10000 010
83	E	10000 011
84	H	10000 100
85	L	10000 101
86 (HL)	10000 110

ADC A,n
8F	A	10001 111
88	B	10001 000
89	C	10001 001
8A	D	10001 010
8B	E	10001 011
8C	H	10001 100
8D	L	10001 101
8E (HL)	10001 110

SUB A,n
97	A	10010 111
90	B	10010 000
91	C	10010 001
92	D	10010 010
93	E	10010 011
94	H	10010 100
95	L	10010 101
96 (HL)	10010 110

SBC A,n
9F	A	10011 111
98	B	10011 000
99	C	10011 001
9A	D	10011 010
9B	E	10011 011
9C	H	10011 100
9D	L	10011 101
9E (HL)	10011 110

AND A,n
A7	A	10100 111
A0	B	10100 000
A1	C	10100 001
A2	D	10100 010
A3	E	10100 011
A4	H	10100 100
A5	L	10100 101
A6 (HL)	10100 110

XOR A,n
AF	A	10101 111
A8	B	10101 000
A9	C	10101 001
AA	D	10101 010
AB	E	10101 011
AC	H	10101 100
AD	L	10101 101
AE (HL)	10101 110

OR A,n
B7	A	10110 111
B0	B	10110 000
B1	C	10110 001
B2	D	10110 010
B3	E	10110 011
B4	H	10110 100
B5	L	10110 101
B6 (HL)	10110 110

CP A,n
BF	A	10111 111
B8	B	10111 000
B9	C	10111 001
BA	D	10111 010
BB	E	10111 011
BC	H	10111 100
BD	L	10111 101
BE (HL)	10111 110

I-Type ALU Instructions:

ADD A,#
C6	#	11000 110; #### ####

ADC A,#
CE	#	11001 110; #### ####

SUB A,#
D6	#	11010 110; #### ####

SBC A,#
DE	#	11011 110; #### ####

AND A,#
E6	#	11100 110; #### ####

XOR A,n
EE	#	11101 110; #### ####

OR A,n
F6	#	11110 110; #### ####

CP A,#
FE	#	11111 110; #### ####

ADD16 SP, n
E8	BC	11101 001; #### ####

DAA	27	-/-	00100 111

CPL	2F	-/-	00101 111

SCF	37	-/-	00110 111

CCF	3F	-/-	00111 111

STOP
10 00	-/-	0001 0000; 0000 0000

NOP
00	-/-	00000 000

HALT
76	-/-	01110 110

DI
F3	-/-	11110 111

EI
FB	-/-	11111 011

RLCA
07	-/-	00000 111

RLA
17	-/-	00010 111

RRCA
0F	-/-	00001 111

RRA
1F	-/-	00011 111

RLC n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 07	A	11001011; 00 000 111
CB 00	B	11001011; 00 000 000
CB 01	C	11001011; 00 000 001
CB 02	D	11001011; 00 000 010
CB 03	E	11001011; 00 000 011
CB 04	H	11001011; 00 000 100
CB 05	L	11001011; 00 000 101
CB 06  (HL)	11001011; 00 000 110

RRC n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 0F	A	11001011; 00 001 111
CB 08	B	11001011; 00 001 000
CB 09	C	11001011; 00 001 001
CB 0A	D	11001011; 00 001 010
CB 0B	E	11001011; 00 001 011
CB 0C	H	11001011; 00 001 100
CB 0D	L	11001011; 00 001 101
CB 0E  (HL)	11001011; 00 001 110

RL n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 17	A	11001011; 00 010 111
CB 10	B	11001011; 00 010 000
CB 11	C	11001011; 00 010 001
CB 12	D	11001011; 00 010 010
CB 13	E	11001011; 00 010 011
CB 14	H	11001011; 00 010 100
CB 15	L	11001011; 00 010 101
CB 16  (HL)	11001011; 00 010 110

RR n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 1F	A	11001011; 00 011 111
CB 18	B	11001011; 00 011 000
CB 19	C	11001011; 00 011 001
CB 1A	D	11001011; 00 011 010
CB 1B	E	11001011; 00 011 011
CB 1C	H	11001011; 00 011 100
CB 1D	L	11001011; 00 011 101
CB 1E  (HL)	11001011; 00 011 110

SLA n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 27	A	11001011; 00 101 111
CB 20	B	11001011; 00 101 000
CB 21	C	11001011; 00 100 001
CB 22	D	11001011; 00 100 010
CB 23	E	11001011; 00 100 011
CB 24	H	11001011; 00 100 100
CB 25	L	11001011; 00 100 101
CB 26  (HL)	11001011; 00 100 110

SRA n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 2F	A	11001011; 00 101 111
CB 28	B	11001011; 00 101 000
CB 29	C	11001011; 00 101 001
CB 2A	D	11001011; 00 101 010
CB 2B	E	11001011; 00 101 011
CB 2C	H	11001011; 00 101 100
CB 2D	L	11001011; 00 101 101
CB 2E  (HL)	11001011; 00 101 110

SWAP n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB30	B	11001011; 00 110 000
CB31	C	11001011; 00 110 001
CB32	D	11001011; 00 110 010
CB33	E	11001011; 00 110 011
CB34	H	11001011; 00 110 100
CB35	L	11001011; 00 110 101
CB36   (HL)	11001011; 00 110 110
CB37	A	11001011; 00 110 111

SRL n
where n is A,B,C,D,E,H,L,(HL)

CB 3F	A	11001011; 00 111 111
CB 38	B	11001011; 00 111 000
CB 39	C	11001011; 00 111 001
CB 3A	D	11001011; 00 111 010
CB 3B	E	11001011; 00 111 011
CB 3C	H	11001011; 00 111 100
CB 3D	L	11001011; 00 111 101
CB 3E  (HL)	11001011; 00 111 110
